mapper.select: select s.ID as id, s.SHOP_ID as shopId, s.ACTIVITY_NAME as activityName, s.SKU_ID as skuId, s.ACTIVITY_STATUS as activityStatus, s.CREATE_USER_NO as createUserNo, s.SUSPEND_START_TIME as suspendStartTime, s.SUSPEND_END_TIME as suspendEndTime, s.CREATE_TIME as createTime, s.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, s.UPDATE_USER_NO as updateUserNo, s.LOG_OFF_TYPE as logOffType, s.TO_WH_TIME as toWhTime, s.SKU_CODE as skuCode from t_ma_sku_appointment_wh s where s.SKU_ID = #{skuId} and s.SHOP_ID = #{shopId} and s.ACTIVITY_STATUS='Y' and s.SUSPEND_START_TIME < #{payTime} and s.SUSPEND_END_TIME > #{payTime}
